item.title: Projects - Volt Data Lab
item.description:
As a data analyst at Volt Data Lab, I participated in some projects that involved data collection, analysis and visualization, from many different sources.

  • Science Pulse: online tool to connect journalists to scientific conversation in social media, by finding content from a list of trustworthy sources of experts/researchers who engage on social media (mainly on Twitter). This project involved working with R on remote servers and Shiny.

  • R Packages: two packages to extract data from APIs developed by Volt Data Lab: pollingBR, which gets data about electoral polls compiled by news website Poder360; and crossfire, that gets data about gun shootings in Rio de Janeiro and Recife’s metropolitan areas, collected by the Fogo Cruzado initiative.

  • Data and statics on podcasts in Brazil, 2019 (in Portuguese): report produced by Sérgio Spagnuolo and I, in which we collected and analysed data on Brazilian and International podcasts hosted on Pocket Casts. Data was collected in July and August, 2019 and the code can be found on GitHub.

  • Terra de Resistentes: collaborative project which investigates threats to environmental leaders and their communities in seven countries on Latin America. I contributed with data analysis and visualization on threats to indigenous communities in Rondônia. This story involved data analysis from indigenous lands, deforestation, illegal roads, hidrography, mining and rural lands.

item.title: News stories on G1
item.description:
From July to November, 2018, I worked on the news website G1, when I wrote stories on politics, especially about the Brazilian general elections. In this post, I gather the links for all the stories I produced (or co-produced). Most of them were published in the “Election in Numbers” (Eleição em Números) section, and were about many topics, including campaign and party finance, female candidates quotas, reelection, polls, candidate and electorate profile and electoral results.

  • Polling place results show “straight ballot” votes in most runoff elections. Original: Resultados da votações por urna mostram dobradinha na maioria dos estados no 2º turno. 07 nov. 2018.

  • Almost 3 in 4 state and federal deputies are running for reelection. Original: Quase 3 em cada 4 deputados estaduais e federais da última legislatura buscam novo mandato. 16 set. 2018.

  • Even with new law, proportion of women does not increase in Election and the Court needs to notify parties to fulfill gender quotas.. Original: Mesmo com lei, proporção de mulheres não aumenta nas eleições e Justiça precisa notificar coligações para que cumpram cota. 24 ago. 2018 (with Clara Velasco, Gabriela Sarmento and Lucas Vidigal)

  • Number of police and military officers elected for legislative position is four times larger than in 2014. Original: Número de policiais e militares no Legislativo é quatro vezes maior do que o de 2014. 08 out. 2018. (with Gabriela Caesar and Ana Carolina Moreno)
